title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: [deleted] Rise of Skywalker Star Destroyers There is a list of awful things that can be discussed about this movie, but the Star Destroyers are absolutely ridiculous. All of Palpâ€™s star destroyers are equipped with planet killing canons? Give me a break. Absolute garbage/lazy writing. I am rewatching them because I am prepping for a trivia event at the local brewery. Such a struggle to get through.
